headline: ComEd Unveils New Power Infrastructure Upgrades at Itasca Substation
summary: ITASCA, Ill., July 15, 2025--ComEd today joined business and community leaders from Itasca and the surrounding area for a ribbon cutting event to mark the completion of a critical infrastructure investment at the transmission substation located in Itasca. These investments continue to support economic growth, prepare the region for future power needs, and increase reliability and resiliency of the local transmission system.
